## GeoBox.growToContain() method

Update the bounding box by considering a given point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
growToContain(point: GeoCoordinates): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | The point that may expand the bounding box. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
